title: Wayne Finley
subtitle: Powerful, harrowing stories from North Korean refugees at TNKR’s speech contest today. It’s unbelievable what they have been through to reach South Korea. title: CCTV
subtitle: Girls from the Sijju, Shemmarin and Rayyan refugee camps pose for a photo with their new hairstyles in Azez district of Aleppo, #Syria on August 28, 2019. The hair of more than 2,000 Syrian girls was combed and adorned with colored hairpins.pic.twitter.com/MiiuIE2pCh

title: UNHCR Afghanistan
subtitle: Zahida, a refugee returnee, holds the wool balls spun by her grandmother for the production of carpets.
